00011   TrackProjection::TrackProjection() {
00012     /*

00022   TrackProjection::TrackProjection(const TBTrack::TrackFitResult &r) :
00023     TBTrack::TrackFitResult(r) {
00024     /*
00025       assert(sizeof(TrackProjection)==
00026       sizeof(int)*numberOfInts+
00027       sizeof(float)*numberOfFloats+
00028       sizeof(double)*numberOfDoubles);

00031 
00032   unsigned TrackProjection::xy() const {
00033     return (_fitType)&0x1;
00034   }
00035 
00036   unsigned TrackProjection::fb() const {
00037     return (_fitType>>1)&0x1;
00038   }
00039 
00040   unsigned TrackProjection::eh() const {
00041     return (_fitType>>2)&0x1;
00042   }
00043 
00044   void TrackProjection::fitType(unsigned xy, unsigned fb, unsigned eh) {
00045     assert(xy<2 && fb<2 && eh<2);
00046     _fitType=4*eh+2*fb+xy;
00047   }
00048 
00049   int TrackProjection::hit(unsigned i) const {
00050     assert(i<4);
00051     return _hits[i];
00052   }
00053 
00054   void TrackProjection::hit(unsigned i, int t) {
00055     assert(i<4);
00056     _hits[i]=t;
00057   }
00058 
00059   std::ostream& TrackProjection::print(std::ostream &o, const std::string &s) const {
00060     o << s << "TrackProjection::print()" << std::endl;
00061 
00062     TBTrack::TrackFitResult::print(o,s+" ");
00063 
00064     o << s << " Fit type = ";
00065     if(xy()==0) o << "x, ";
00066     else        o << "y, ";
00067     if(fb()==0) o << "f, ";
00068     else        o << "b, ";
00069     if(eh()==0) o << "e";
00070     else        o << "h";
00071     o << std::endl;
00072 
00073     for(unsigned i(0);i<4;i++) {
00074       o << s << "  Layer " << i << ", TDC value = "
00075         << std::setw(6) << _hits[i] << std::endl;
00076     }
00077 
00078     return o;
00079   }

00109 #ifndef DISABLE_LCIO
00110 #include "IMPL/LCGenericObjectImpl.h"
00111 
00112 namespace TBTrack {
00113   
00114   TrackProjection::TrackProjection(const EVENT::LCGenericObject *p) {
00115     set(p);
00116   }
00117   
00118   void TrackProjection::set(const EVENT::LCGenericObject *p) {
00119     assert(p->getNInt()==6);
00120     assert(p->getNDouble()==6);
00121     assert(p->isFixedSize());
00122 
00123     _hitPattern=p->getIntVal(0);
00124     _fitType=p->getIntVal(1);
00125     _hits[0]=p->getIntVal(2);
00126     _hits[1]=p->getIntVal(3);
00127     _hits[2]=p->getIntVal(4);
00128     _hits[3]=p->getIntVal(5);
00129 
00130     _parameters[0]=p->getDoubleVal(0);
00131     _parameters[1]=p->getDoubleVal(1);
00132     _errorMatrix[0]=p->getDoubleVal(2);
00133     _errorMatrix[1]=p->getDoubleVal(3);
00134     _errorMatrix[2]=p->getDoubleVal(4);
00135     _chiSquared=p->getDoubleVal(5);
00136   }
00137   
00138   EVENT::LCGenericObject* TrackProjection::get() const {
00139     IMPL::LCGenericObjectImpl *p(new IMPL::LCGenericObjectImpl(6,0,6));
00140 
00141     p->setIntVal(0,_hitPattern);
00142     p->setIntVal(1,_fitType);
00143     p->setIntVal(2,_hits[0]);
00144     p->setIntVal(3,_hits[1]);
00145     p->setIntVal(4,_hits[2]);
00146     p->setIntVal(5,_hits[3]);
00147     
00148     p->setDoubleVal(0,_parameters[0]);
00149     p->setDoubleVal(1,_parameters[1]);
00150     p->setDoubleVal(2,_errorMatrix[0]);
00151     p->setDoubleVal(3,_errorMatrix[1]);
00152     p->setDoubleVal(4,_errorMatrix[2]);
00153     p->setDoubleVal(5,_chiSquared);
00154 
00155     return p;
00156   }
00157 
00158 }
00159 
00160 #endif
